subject: Ye Official Poster!
event: Look on HBO's works, ye mighty, and despair.

comments.article: WOW.  That makes a statement!!  Most excellent.

Amazing poster. Just amazing. A shame that Ice is just too big for that composition, because it would have been great in there.

As was pointed out to me, the crow happens to be three-eyed... ;)

Also, The Maester's Path is a fun way to see some exclusive clips and have a bit of fun with puzzles. If the second one's stumping you, there are some hints here.

So I get to the screen showing the Maester's chain (very cool, BTW. Totally not what I envisioned, but cool) and couldn't figure out what to do next. The screen doesn't scroll so all I had to work with was what was there. AND NOTHING TO CLICK ON! I had to close and minimize some of my extensive toolbars, but eventually got to where I could just BARELY see a button there to click. I don't know if it is Firefox, or how they lay out these screens, but would it have killed them to turn on the scroll bars!?
comments.subject: There IS a button there!

comments.article: Anyone know if I can post this as my profile on FB. Don't want to cross any lines, but would love to throw that up there.
comments.subject: Can I post this on Facebook as my Profile?

comments.article:
Found it! It is on the Production Diary page on HBO.COM. Link to this to put it on your Facebook profile. Since that's the "official" source, you're not violating any policy.
http://www.makinggameofthrones.com/storage/game-of-thrones-poster.jpg
comments.subject: Re: Can I post this on Facebook as my Profile?

comments.article:
Oh! It's very good.
Would be glad to find where to get one or two of it.

I did see they posted new House shirts! That's the first I've seen those!

http://store.hbo.com/?v=hbo_shows_game-of-thrones&nvbar=Top+Navigation:Shows:Game+of+Thrones
comments.subject: Anyone find the poster?

comments.article:
O.O

I must have that poster!
OMG *SQUEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE*!
Same week as new Doctor Who! BEST WEEK EVER,!!

I think it's awesome and all but not sure why they'd have Eddard on the Iron Throne given the whole thing with the Kinslayer and all... trying to be spoiler free but you all know what I'm talking about.
comments.subject: Eddard on the Iron Throne?

comments.article:
Probably because Sean Bean is a huge star and lots of people will recognize him? I've not followed all the casting news, but I recognize Sean Bean even if I've never read Game Of Thrones*, and I'd be more likely to tune in.

*I _have_ read GoT, I'm just making a point. :)
comments.subject: Re: Eddard on the Iron Throne?

comments.article: And round the image of this poster, boundless with flair, the growing masses of excited fans stretch far away. :D
According to this its 50/50 for Ned! :P
Now that is what a throne should look like.
That is one gorgeous throne.
awesome
SO EXCITED!!!!

Poster looks great!

Another season they should use, 'All Men Must Die'; of course with Arya, Nymera and Needle.
comments.subject: Another Season...

comments.article:
WOW!!!!

TV has become the new movies. All the best, most interesting, most cutting edge storytelling comes out on TV while Hollywood movie studios churn out mostly the same old same old 90% of the time.

This goes into my who'd have thunkit file.
Hey there. Poster looks nice, though I personally don't care for the 'YOU WIN OR YOU DIE' part. I think it would have looked better without. Anyway, looking forward to the series. Congrats.
The awesome,it stuns,
Love!

I look at this picture and feel the intense need to bow.

This is the most excited I've been for a series in a long time. Usually stuff like this ends up being awful, but this is HBO, and it seems like the production's been really careful to keep the balance of the story being both for the fans and for newcomers. I showed this to my parents, and they were interested despite having no clue who anyone was.

I hope you're as excited as we are, Mr. Martin! :)

Awesome. Awesome.

... If only I had HBO.
It's beautiful!

comments.upictitle: my mascara runs in constellations for you, dear.: [glee] those dudes.
comments.article:
NED FOR KING 2011! \o/ heh.

poster looks outstanding. shoooowwwwww, come to me!!!
I want that poster on my wall like, yesterday. :P
comments.subject: O_O
